version_description: Now better than ever, the game has a refreshed look and feel. Get a glimpse of your in-game progress with a daily report in the lobby, and have more fun with the updated game shortcuts!
Now better than ever, the game has a refreshed look and feel. Get a glimpse of your in-game progress with a daily report in the lobby, and have more fun with the updated game shortcuts!

The world’s most popular mobile word game is better and more clever than ever with all new game modes built for the word player in all of us. Beautifully and intelligently redesigned, Words With Friends 2 is teeming with more ways to challenge your friends and your brain than ever before. Try the NEW Solo Challenge events, Lightning Round, and more! Play today!

May the Best Friend Win.

Try the NEW Solo Challenge events, Lightning Round, and more! Play today!

- LIVE – Our new live trivia game show is pulling out all the stops with some big $$ shows this month.
- LUNAR NEW YEAR Event – Join our Year of the Pig celebration and bestow a wish for success and prosperity on your next match.
- NEW PREMIUM Tile Style – Make your board a literal gift with our “handmade” Heart Gift Box tiles. There’s nothing like a box of LETTERS
- NEW CHAT FEATURE – You can now “mute” any unwanted chats in the chat channel.

Introducing Tile Styles; swap out the iconic yellow tile with new vibrant colors and patterns.
Help us celebrate Breast Cancer Awareness month by playing the Pink Ribbon Tile Style in our Susan G Komen: Play Pink For The Cure event!

PREMIUM STYLE TILES BUNDLE

Bring Autumn to your board with newly launched Premium Tile Style: Fall Leaves
Available in-store only for a short time in our seasonal BUNDLE packed with powerups and coins
Rake it up before it’s gone Nov 30th

Throughout February we’re spreading the love with handcrafted events, solo challenges and themed LIVE shows.
- Words With Friends LIVE - Tune in 2/17 at 6PM PST for our biggest LIVE show yet with a heart pumping prize of $100,000!
- NEW Chat Feature – You can now “mute” any unwanted chats in the chat channel.
If you haven’t heard, we’re celebrating our 10-Year Friendiversary this year! More on that soon!

While you wait for winter’s end, warm up with Words With Friends!
- Solo Challenge: Test yourself against themed ladders of increasingly difficult WordMasters!
- NEW Tile Styles: Express yourself with a selection of colorful tiles. Check out our store for new Premium Styles every month
- Words With Friends LIVE: Test your word trivia knowledge for a chance to win immediate $$ prizes. Every day at 6PM PST!

Performing some background word play maintenance and optimizing WordMaster rhetoric.
- Solo Challenge: Test yourself against themed ladders of increasingly difficult WordMasters
- Tile Styles: Freshen up your board with some fun new tile colors. We’re constantly adding more so keep earning those mystery boxes!
- Words With Friends LIVE: Our first season has ended on a high musical note, thanks to Garth Brooks! Follow us on Twitter to find out what's coming next!

We’re always working in the background to make your game experience even better: reshuffling some tiles, testing our WordMasters and reading the dictionary.

• Solo Challenge: You’re missing out if you haven’t tried our incredible fun Solo Challenge ladders. A great way to pass the time or improve your word skills. New themes every two weeks!
• Tile Styles: Break out those summer colors! Keep earning those mystery boxes and keep an eye out for more Premium Tile Styles on sale in the store

BIG THINGS COMING: Get ready for some exciting stuff in July, our official Friendiversary month! We have 10 years of things to celebrate

BIG THINGS COMING: Get ready for some exciting stuff in July, our official Friendiversary month! We have 10 years of things to celebrate

It's our 10th Friendiversary this month! Together, we've created 18.4 billion games since we launched 10 years ago (that's 57 connections a second!). We're celebrating all July with stories, rewards, new features and, of course, words.
- Friendiversary Event: Biggest in-game event yet with new community challenge: create 100 million games in 21 days. Ends 7/28
- NEW Tile Legacy Collection: Celebrating your journey with us with 3 FREE unique tile styles based on years played
- Solo Challenge: Boss Edition: Test yourself against the WordMaster bosses from past Solo Challenges!
- 7/19 Party: Come party with us on our actual annversary! Special gifts, fun challenges and more

It's our 10th Friendiversary this month! Together, we've created 18.4 billion games since we launched 10 years ago (that's 57 connections a second!). We're celebrating all July with stories, rewards, new features and, of course, words.
- Friendiversary Event: Biggest in-game event yet with new community challenge: create 100 million games in 21 days. Ends 7/28
- NEW Tile Legacy Collection: Celebrating your journey with us with 3 FREE unique tile styles based on years played
- Solo Challenge: Boss Edition: Test yourself against the WordMaster bosses from past Solo Challenges!
- 7/19 Party: Come party with us on our actual annversary! Special gifts, fun challenges and more

It's our 10th Friendiversary this month! Together, we've created 18.4 billion games since we launched 10 years ago (that's 57 connections a second!). We're celebrating all July with stories, rewards, new features and, of course, words.
- Friendiversary Event: Biggest in-game event yet with new community challenge: create 100 million games in 21 days. Ends 7/28
- NEW Tile Legacy Collection: Celebrating your journey with us with 3 FREE unique tile styles based on years played
- Solo Challenge: Boss Edition: Test yourself against the WordMaster bosses from past Solo Challenges!
- 7/19 Party: Come party with us on our actual anniversary! Special gifts, fun challenges and more

Our 10th Friendiversary celebration continues! Even more new features, stories and play.

- NEW Daily Word Play: Find the best scoring words to complete each game board to win a Mystery Box. New prize and puzzles every day. It's a great way to practice your puzzle skills while you're waiting for your friends to play back.
- NEW Flash Events: Limited time events with unique challenges and packed Mystery Box rewards. Keep your eyes open as they come and go in a flash!
- UPDATED Streaks: Play the same friend every day to ignite the coveted flame icon on the game board. The longer the streak, the hotter the flame becomes. Be careful, miss one day and your flame could go out.

TRY SUBSCRIPTIONS: Renew your Ads-Free Bundle every month! You can check it out in the game store.

NEW FEATURES! Like Daily Word Play; rewarding puzzles for days.
NEW POWER UPS! Try Word Clue to help you a word, just ANY WORD, to get you to the next move

New and exciting challenges you can take on in between classes, your next meeting or on your break.

- Battle for supremacy in DUELS, our newest limited time event. Go head-to-head in a fast, multi-board race to be first to score 150 points. It can happen at any time, so stay vigilant!
- Don't be clueless, try the new Power Up WORD CLUE for an insightful nudge on your next turn
- Made design tweaks to Solo Challenge to make it easier to track your path to Mastery
- More bug fixes, performance optimizations and general polishing

Go Ads Free with SUBSCRIPTIONS. Simple renewal every month without hassle! Check it out on the store tab.

It might not feel like fall, but you can still enjoy the season with a spicy Pumpkin Latte and our exciting Oct. themed events!

Support Breast Cancer Awareness month with the Pink Ribbon Tile and participate in our #WordsWithHope campaign on Twitter @WordsWFriends

- Don't be clueless, try the new Power Up WORD CLUE for an insightful nudge on your next turn

Can you hear the crunch, snap and crackle of fall? This is the perfect season for onomatopoeias; words that imitate sounds. Have you played any yet?

No big changes in this update as we're hard at work putting the finishing touches on some delightful holiday treats.
- Updated Solo Challenge with better progress indicators to track your way to Mastery
- New opt-in chat feature gives you more control over your social experience
- Mystery box screen now includes "information" button to explain rewards

Can you hear the crunch, snap and crackle of fall? This is the perfect season for onomatopoeias; words that imitate sounds. Have you played any yet?

No big changes in this update as we're hard at work putting the finishing touches on some delightful holiday treats.
- Updated Solo Challenge with better progress indicators to track your way to Mastery
- New opt-in chat feature gives you more control over your social experience
- Mystery box screen now includes "information" button to explain rewards

We're hard at work in our metaphorical kitchen cooking up a cornucopia of savory morphemes (words). Let us give thanks.

Main Course: Garth Brooks is back for part 2 of #WordsWithGarth. Collect your free Garth Brooks Vinyl Tile Style and check out our Facebook fan page for a chance to win his critically acclaimed Legacy Collection.

Appetizers:
- Improved 'Discover Someone New' and 'Match of the Day' to find new challengers while you travel or digest (or both)!
- NEW EVENT: Words In The Wind and NEW SOLO CHALLENGE: Historic Challengers

Dessert? It's a surprise. Be sure to log in often during these next two months.

HAPPY HOLIDAYS from Words With Friends
EVERYONE GETS A GIFT!
Log in on Dec 25th for a special holiday gift from the Words With Friends team.
NEW WINTERY LOOK
Our game has transformed into a magical winter night. Play in our seasonal wonderscape and share magical words (and moments) with friends.
NEW SOLO CHALLENGES
Whether you're competing for best gift wrapper or engaging in spirited play with Father Christmas's reindeer, you're sure to have a merry time this month.

Happy New Decade! Thank you for choosing our 2020 Word Of The Year: UNITY.

NEW MINI GAME
Get into a smooth flow with our NEW Word Wheel mini game event. It's crosswords meets word search: spin, search, PLAY!

ONE WEEK SOLO CHALLENGES
We had some extra characters lined up and decided to start 2020 off with a marathon of back-to-back 7 day Solo Challenges. Can you master them all?

FROZEN NEW EVENT
Get your chisels ready for our chillingly beautiful Ice Festival event. Keep your fingers warm by collecting mittens to unlock your prizes.

What's a 4-letter word for the feeling Words With Friends players have for, well, words? Show someone you're thinking of them with some fun word play!

NEW FLASH EVENTS
We're keeping things fresh with 6 new ones. From letter pairs to high scores, you're going to find both your biggest challenge and easiest wins. Do you have a favorite?

FEB EVENT
Celebrate Mardi Gras with us! Collect all the masks and unlock the King's Cake Badge! Unfortunately, it's not edible.

FEB SOLO CHALLENGES
- Mardi Gras Madness - Get crazy with these wild revelers
- Rosy Romancers - all is flair in love and words

Hi, we made YOU a special video featuring your most amazing Words With Friends Achievements and revealing your #WordStyle.

WHAT'S YOUR #WORDSTYLE? The question you never knew to ask: are you an Achiever, Rock Star or Social Butterfly? Log in and find out NOW!

Speaking of ACHIEVEMENTS. They just got better. More levels to earn, new worlds to explore and beautifully themed tile styles to unlock.

Did your level inexplicably go up? Well that's because we introduced more Achievements many of which you probably completed resulting in a higher level. Go you! Check your progress map to claim your just rewards!

Words With Friends has joined with mobile games across the industry to promote #PlayApartTogether - a campaign supporting #PhysicalDistancing through gameplay encouraging World Health Organization guidelines.

You can 'Play A Part' simply by enjoying your favorite game and connecting with friends and family through fun word play.

NEW MINI GAME - Word Wheel
A word search meets crosswords mini puzzler to challenge and relax your mind. Don't believe us? Take it for a spin.
